summary: It disables the ugly snow patches in the Winterhold College area.
descriptionHtml:
Description
It disables the ugly snow patches in the Winterhold College area.  I finally got tired of seeing the snow patches near Winterhold so I made this mod that disables them so they dont show up anymore, especially after trying other snow textures/mods and they were still there.  The snow patches are only disabled so there should not be any issues with any other mods trying to reference them.  

Compatibility
Should be compatible with everything, didnt change or move anything just disable so they dont show up.

Installation
Download with manager or manually put esp in skyrim data folder and activate.

Known Issues
None so far, let me know if there are any.

Permissions
Anyone can use this file however they want, just give credit, no permission needed.
author: Argonite21
